DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this post-marketing surveillance study is to collect and assess information on safety and efficacy of valaciclovir in pediatric patients with chickenpox
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for VALTREX (Valaciclovir) (Pediatrics Chickenpox)
DOC.criteria: Pediatric patients with chickenpox (aged less than 15 years old). Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to the ingredients of valaciclovir or acyclovir.
